name: Granny Simulator
description: In Granny Simulator there are two players, a feeble old grandmother and her lovely grandson. The grandmothers objective is to complete her every day routine while the grandson utilizes uncanny violence and pure brutality to stop her.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD A10-7850K Memory: 4 GB GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
